sourcesContent:
Eventos do components

Tema:{{evento.tema}}

Local:{{evento.local}}

import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-eventos', templateUrl: './eventos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./eventos.component.scss'] }) export class EventosComponent implements OnInit { public eventos : any ; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnInit() { this.getEventos(); } public getEventos() : void { this.http.get('https://localhost:5001/api/eventos').subscribe( response => this.eventos = response, error => console.log(error) ); } }
